content: My 17yr old son got me into this game and now I'm kicking his butt. So, I think the game is great.
1 star - An annoying pop up repeatedly asked for this rating, so here it is: Good game but downloaded it today and completed it in less than an hour. I wouldn't bother downloading it
Cool and exciting app. Need more variety of levels though.
Needs more levels. Beat the whole thing in an hour.
i want my money back
Barely qualifies as a game, 10 minutes of spooky stories tops
Its actually fun, similar to previous designs
A solid four stars. Maybe four and a half. I really like the variety. I do wish you could lead it a bit better or differently, but if you read it it's entertaining to see all of the options.
Needs to be a lot longer

The game was decent I'm giving it three stars because theres not much else to do other than 4 scenarios. If it had like a multiplayer feature or perhaps just a few more scenarios this game would be alot better than it already is.

Not worth any money. First there are 1000 other apps with a similar premise/game play. Second there is no real incentive to beating a level much less the game. After you beat the four levels you have two options, continue to play for no reason or want a refund. I want a refund...
Cool idea, English language needs about of polishing. Nothing too bad. Would be better if the population dropped slower. Also there should be a great old ones storyline
It advertised something different but is still a good game

I am trying to figure why there is even a charge for this game? Beat all scenarios within 25 mins [not achievments] the game is supper straight forward you really can't lose. Minimal effects its basicly just you spinning the planet to collect currency and spend it. Collect 40 spend collect 40 spend and you win.
I enjoy it very much
Maybe add some graphics that progressively change how the earth looks depending on the scenario or stories you chose. Makes the game kinda bland with just picture pop ups

I beat the entire game before my refund timer expired. So I refunded the $2. The gameplay was completely one-dimensional, and far too easy. The English translation was spotty at best, and nearly incomprehensible at its worst. Not a terrible concept, but abysmal execution.
Definite room for improvement, could be more difficult and there are no births. The population should rise with births and decline with your efforts at death.

It's a fun little strategy game, but having only 4 scenarios to replay over and over gets old fast, when i had all 4 beat in about 30 mins (i know the goal is to get faster). Also, if there could be visual effects on the globe based on your decisions, that would be incredible, and would feel like your story is so much more customizable. For example, if in the story Asia becomes covered in Ice, the globe shows an ice covered asia.
This game is awesome! Love the new scenarios!
Paid for and it won't even download. Phone storage is fine. Stops at 78% and pops up error can't download app
replyContent: Hi, it’s probably some google’s issue, please try to download it again later.

content: LOL Perfect for quarantine

I like the idea here. I think you could have alot more fun pushing the storylines farther. Like having say the asteroid strike be its own senerio. Pick where you hit, go into the aftershock and fallout.
Very fun ,thank you
You get to kill everybody
Not too much depth too it
Could be more visual with whats happening. Show the earth in screen reacting.
Fun time killer. Love the unique scenarios and something different with every choice.
Excellent game and concept, but would benefit from a more immersive interface
I'm enjoying this overall, i love the stories that are there and the many different paths you can take. Definitely a 5/5 in my book.

I really enjoy this game, though my one complaint is that it's too damn easy! 😂 Why don't you tweak it to make a little more challenging? Oh, and sometimes the stars are still on the screen when I'm starting a new game. Can you fix that please?
replyContent: Hi Godzillaman, thank you for review. We have just fixed bug with stars.

content: Fun game, seems like a really good start to something bigger.
The game has greate potential. Could you add more sound and visual effects. Like war planes or volcano eruptions. Also it seems to easy. Maybe add in more in game features

Tried to refund this game but for some reason it didn't let me due to policy issues. Please send refund. Played for 15 mins and complete the game, got bored and see no replay value as the scenarios seem too obvious and easy.
Tremendous game that I got addicted to right away. Can not wait for updates. Thank you!
Repeating storylines and the storylines themselves aren't long enough for one storyline to kill humanity in it's entirety. It's a cool concept but a complete flop.
replyContent: Thank you for review. We'll try to fix that.

content: I love this! It's so much fun! Albeit, a little too fast. More options in each story and the ability to control game speed would be welcome. Still, I think this is a masterpiece in the making! I can't wait to see what the future holds for this game!!!
replyContent: Hi, Cody. Thank you for positive review and ideas for the game improvement.

content: Fun game very enjoyable I kinda wish you could see effects on the globe though such as nukes going off etc.
replyContent: Thank you for positive review and cool idea with effects on the planet.

content: Similar to plague Inc however more story based enjoyable and a decent time passer. Hopefully will have more content.
replyContent: Thank you for positive review. We glad that you like the game. We're trying to make the game better.

content: Great game with lots of potential, not intrusive with ads, allows for alot of creation and gives the player a chance to delve into the more 'what if's' out there. Looking forward to new scenarios.
Fun and interesting game. Gd time passing stragedy. Though could do with some tweets. Such as increasing the sin storage, adding some more scenarios and possibly auto sin collection.
replyContent: Thank you for positive review and good ideas to improve the game.

content: Meh, good concept but lacking. I like the idea of killing the world, but this has no real depth. You click and the death count goes up. Within 10 mins the game ends. And you start again. There is no attachment there. No investment, you dont feel the consequences of your actions. It's just a number that gets bigger. Theres no replayability. If you like the concept, stick with plague inc. Instead. Far far better game.
replyContent: Thank you for review. We are working on improvements and want to make the game better.
